parameters.label: Chunk Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for chunk-based results in hybrid retrieval. Higher values prioritize direct document matches over entity-filtered results.

parameters.label: Entity Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for entity-filtered results. Higher values prioritize results that match extracted entities from your query.

parameters.label: Path Weight
parameters.tooltip: Weight for path-based results in multi-hop reasoning. Higher values prioritize results found through entity relationship traversal.

parameters.label: Max Hops
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of relationship hops to traverse when following entity connections. Higher values explore deeper relationships but increase query time.

parameters.label: Beam Size
parameters.tooltip: Number of top paths to maintain during multi-hop search. Higher values explore more alternative paths but increase computation.

parameters.label: Graph Expansion Depth
parameters.tooltip: Maximum depth for expanding the knowledge graph around retrieved chunks. 0 disables expansion, higher values find more related context.

parameters.label: Top K Results
parameters.tooltip: Number of top chunks to return from the vector/entity retrieval step before any reranking or graph expansion. Larger values increase recall but also cost.

parameters.label: Max Expanded Chunks
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of chunks to keep after graph expansion. Limits memory and downstream LLM context size.

parameters.label: Expansion Similarity Threshold
parameters.tooltip: Minimum similarity required for chunks to be considered during graph expansion. Higher values produce tighter, more relevant expansions.

parameters.label: Min Retrieval Similarity
parameters.tooltip: Minimum similarity cutoff for retrieved chunks to be considered relevant. Lower values increase recall.

parameters.label: Enable FlashRank Reranker
parameters.tooltip: Toggle to enable FlashRank post-retrieval reranking. Requires FlashRank to be installed on the server.

parameters.label: FlashRank Blend Weight
parameters.tooltip: Blend weight between the original hybrid score and the rerank score (0 = use rerank ordering).

parameters.label: FlashRank Model
parameters.tooltip: Select which FlashRank model to use for reranking. The model must be available in the server cache or will be downloaded on first use.

parameters.label: Restrict to Context Documents
parameters.tooltip: When enabled, limits retrieval to documents explicitly provided in the chat context. Disable to search across all ingested documents.

parameters.label: LLM Model
parameters.tooltip: Select the LLM model used for generation. Use 'custom' to enter a custom model name in the embedding model field.

parameters.label: Embedding Model
parameters.tooltip: Select the text embedding model used for query and chunk embeddings. Changing this affects retrieval quality and may require re-ingestion of documents.
